mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (content, type, target_id, user_id, board_post_id, parent_comment_id, guest_nickname, guest_password) VALUES (#{content}, #{type}, #{targetId}, #{userId}, #{boardPostId}, #{parentCommentId}, #{guestNickname}, #{guestPassword})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM comment WHERE type = #{type} AND target_id = #{targetId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT c.*, u.nickname AS user_nickname FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.id WHERE c.id = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment WHERE user_id = #{userId}

SELECT c.*, u.nickname AS user_nickname, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes_dislikes ld WHERE ld.type = 'comment' AND ld.target_id = c.id AND ld.is_likes = 1 ) AS comment_likes, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM likes_dislikes ld WHERE ld.type = 'comment' AND ld.target_id = c.id AND ld.is_likes = 0 ) AS comment_dislikes FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user u ON u.id = c.user_id WHERE c.board_post_id = #{postId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
